tool_description: Extracts and analyzes key themes, topics, and frequently mentioned terms from customer reviews to identify common praise and complaint patterns.

structured_reviews_source.description: Source identifier for structured review text data

extraction_method.description: Keyword extraction approach: frequency, tfidf, or topic_modeling

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract

min_frequency.description: Minimum occurrence frequency for keyword inclusion

sentiment_split.description: Whether to separate keywords by positive and negative reviews

exclude_common_words.description: Whether to exclude common stop words and generic terms

include_phrases.description: Whether to include multi-word phrases in addition to single keywords

error_messages: Invalid data source: structured_reviews_source not found or contains insufficient text data.
Invalid extraction method: Use one of [frequency, tfidf, topic_modeling].
Parameter out of range: max_keywords must be between 10 and 200, min_frequency must be between 1 and 100.
Insufficient text data: Not enough review text available for meaningful keyword extraction.
Processing failed: Text preprocessing or keyword extraction algorithm encountered an error.
usage: Provide structured_reviews_source with review text. Configure extraction parameters to focus on most relevant keywords and phrases. Returns ranked keywords with frequencies and context.

total_keywords_extracted.description: Total number of unique keywords extracted

keyword_frequencies.description: Frequency counts corresponding to extracted keywords

extraction_summary.description: Summary of keyword extraction results and main themes identified
